long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you don't like writing words down on paper, you can always type them in an app.
如果你不喜欢把单词写在纸上，你可以随时在应用程序中输入它们。

If you learn in small chunks every day in a way that you enjoy. And there is nothing that motivates us more than our own success.
如果每天能以自己喜欢的方式学习小块内容，没有什么比我们自己的成功更能激励我们了。

--《The secrets of learning a new language | TED Talk》
